lead_paragraph: BELSITO-LOVE--Therese, 99, died January 19, 2016 in Napoleon, Ohio. Born May 22, 1916 in New York, NY to the late Anthony and Rafaela (Califano) Rubino, Therese was married to the late James Belsito, and the late Dr. Robert A. Love. Therese had a long career as an academic administrator for The City University of New York. She was listed in Who's Who of American Women and received the 1976 Woman of the Year Award for Administration. She is survived by nieces, Jeanne Wilson, Theresa Clayton, Christine Poutot and Victoria Prince, and nephew, Joseph Petrocine, as well as, many friends and associates in the world of art, music and theater, which were her lifelong passions. She will be remembered for being most generous and devoted to those in need. A celebration of her life will be held in New York at a later date. 1/3
